name: BurnConfinedToEyeAndAdnexa
title: Burn Confined to Eye and Adnexa
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of a burn of the eye and/or adnexa.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of burn of various parts of the eye, or eye corrosion.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
